statements: SELECT * FROM HumanitarianAid
SELECT organization_name, donation_amount FROM HumanitarianAid
SELECT id, organization_name FROM HumanitarianAid WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM HumanitarianAid WHERE organization_name LIKE '%Red Cross%'
SELECT AVG(donation_amount) FROM HumanitarianAid
SELECT SUM(donation_amount) FROM HumanitarianAid
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HumanitarianAid WHERE donation_amount > 500
SELECT MAX(donation_amount) FROM HumanitarianAid
SELECT MIN(donation_amount) FROM HumanitarianAid
SELECT organization_name, COUNT(*) AS total_donations FROM HumanitarianAid GROUP BY organization_name
SELECT id, organization_name, donation_amount FROM HumanitarianAid WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT organization_name, AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation FROM HumanitarianAid GROUP BY organization_name
SELECT organization_name, MAX(donation_amount) AS max_donation FROM HumanitarianAid GROUP BY organization_name
SELECT organization_name, MIN(donation_amount) AS min_donation FROM HumanitarianAid GROUP BY organization_name
SELECT id, organization_name, donation_amount FROM HumanitarianAid ORDER BY donation_amount DESC
SELECT organization_name, donation_amount FROM HumanitarianAid ORDER BY donation_amount ASC
SELECT organization_name, donation_amount FROM HumanitarianAid LIMIT 10
SELECT organization_name, donation_amount FROM HumanitarianAid OFFSET 5
SELECT id, organization_name, donation_amount FROM HumanitarianAid LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10
SELECT SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations, AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donations FROM HumanitarianAid
SELECT * FROM beneficiaries;
SELECT id, name FROM beneficiaries WHERE age > 18;
SELECT address FROM beneficiaries WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM beneficiaries WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, name, age, address FROM beneficiaries WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT donor_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_beneficiaries FROM beneficiaries;
SELECT donor_name, AVG(amount) AS avg_donation FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name HAVING AVG(amount) > 100;
SELECT * FROM beneficiaries ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM beneficiaries WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT donor_name, MAX(amount) AS max_donation FROM donations;
SELECT name AS beneficiary_name, amount AS donation_amount FROM beneficiaries b JOIN donations d ON b.id = d.donation_id;
SELECT id, name FROM beneficiaries WHERE age < 18;
SELECT donor_name, MIN(amount) AS min_donation FROM donations;
SELECT * FROM beneficiaries WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT id, name, age, address FROM beneficiaries WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT donor_name, COUNT(*) AS num_donations FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE org_id = 1
SELECT org_name FROM organizations WHERE org_type = 'public'
SELECT org_id, org_name FROM organizations WHERE org_type = 'private'
SELECT org_name FROM organizations WHERE org_id > 10
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE org_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT org_id, org_name FROM organizations WHERE org_type IN ('public', 'private')
SELECT DISTINCT org_type FROM organizations
SELECT * FROM organizations ORDER BY org_name ASC
SELECT * FROM organizations ORDER BY org_name DESC
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE org_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE org_name LIKE '%s'
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE org_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM organizations
SELECT MAX(org_id) FROM organizations
SELECT AVG(org_id) FROM organizations
SELECT SUM(org_id) FROM organizations
SELECT MIN(org_id) FROM organizations
SELECT * FROM organizations LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM organizations OFFSET 2
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE org_type IS NULL
SELECT * FROM aid_agencies;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name, country FROM aid_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, country FROM aid_agencies WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM aid_workers;
SELECT worker_id, worker_name, skills FROM aid_workers;
SELECT worker_name, skills FROM aid_workers WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM aid_requests;
SELECT request_id, request_date, requester_name FROM aid_requests;
SELECT requester_name, request_description FROM aid_requests WHERE request_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT * FROM aid_deliveries;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, request_id, delivered_quantity FROM aid_deliveries;
SELECT delivery_date, delivered_quantity FROM aid_deliveries WHERE request_id = 1;

SELECT agency_name, worker_name, request_description FROM aid_agencies INNER JOIN aid_workers ON aid_agencies.agency_id = aid_workers.agency_id INNER JOIN aid_requests ON aid_workers.worker_id = aid_requests.worker_id;

SELECT agency_name, request_id, delivery_id FROM aid_agencies INNER JOIN aid_workers ON aid_agencies.agency_id = aid_workers.agency_id INNER JOIN aid_requests ON aid_workers.worker_id = aid_requests.worker_id INNER JOIN aid_deliveries ON aid_requests.request_id = aid_deliveries.request_id;

SELECT agency_name, request_date, delivered_quantity FROM aid_agencies INNER JOIN aid_workers ON aid_agencies.agency_id = aid_workers.agency_id INNER JOIN aid_requests ON aid_workers.worker_id = aid_requests.worker_id INNER JOIN aid_deliveries ON aid_requests.request_id = aid_deliveries.request_id;
SELECT request_description, delivered_quantity FROM aid_requests INNER JOIN aid_deliveries ON aid_requests.request_id = aid_deliveries.request_id;
SELECT requester_name, delivery_date FROM aid_requests INNER JOIN aid_deliveries ON aid_requests.request_id = aid_deliveries.request_id;

SELECT agency_name, worker_name, request_description, delivered_quantity FROM aid_agencies INNER JOIN aid_workers ON aid_agencies.agency_id = aid_workers.agency_id INNER JOIN aid_requests ON aid_workers.worker_id = aid_requests.worker_id INNER JOIN aid_deliveries ON aid_requests.request_id = aid_deliveries.request_id;

SELECT agency_name, country, worker_name, skills, request_date, requester_name, request_description, delivery_date, delivered_quantity FROM aid_agencies INNER JOIN aid_workers ON aid_agencies.agency_id = aid_workers.agency_id INNER JOIN aid_requests ON aid_workers.worker_id = aid_requests.worker_id INNER JOIN aid_deliveries ON aid_requests.request_id = aid_deliveries.request_id;
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT org_name FROM organizations;
SELECT org_name, org_type FROM organizations;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT vol_name, vol_email FROM volunteers;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donation_date, donation_amount FROM donations;
SELECT * FROM supplies;
SELECT supply_name, supply_quantity FROM supplies;
SELECT * FROM distribution;
SELECT dist_date FROM distribution;
SELECT org_name, supply_name FROM organizations JOIN supplies ON organizations.org_id = supplies.supply_id;
SELECT vol_name, donation_amount FROM volunteers JOIN donations ON volunteers.vol_id = donations.vol_id;
SELECT org_name, donation_amount FROM organizations JOIN donations ON organizations.org_id = donations.org_id;
SELECT org_name, supply_name, donation_amount FROM organizations JOIN donations ON organizations.org_id = donations.org_id JOIN supplies ON donations.donation_id = supplies.supply_id;
SELECT vol_name, supply_name, donation_amount FROM volunteers JOIN donations ON volunteers.vol_id = donations.vol_id JOIN supplies ON donations.donation_id = supplies.supply_id;
SELECT DISTINCT org_name FROM organizations;
SELECT SUM(donation_amount) FROM donations;
SELECT AVG(supply_quantity) FROM supplies;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM volunteers;
